title: When your teams asks you to AFK

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
If your team is being toxic, flaming and asks you to afk, even if it's not in the best interests of winning, should you comply?

My team was flaming me, at some point each of the 4 of them, and they asked me to afk, and so I decided, you know what, why don't I.
We lost, as expected, and if I get banned for this, because Riot likes to favor abusive toxic people, so be it.

I've been nice and friendly alot, to alot of angry abusive people, through all the games of league I've played, but I'm getting tired of it. If this account gets banned for this one offence, I'm probably going to quit, because I refuse to play a game where being abusive is ok, but standing up for yourself, is not.

replies.body: Don't understand why you got abused when you are 10 3 up! Please Explain?

I assume premade, and they got all upset because apparently I ksed the ekko and nasus, and Leesin was being hyper aggressive earlygame (though not particularly effective because he was really forcing those ganks and so often didn't achieve anything except leech his laner's xp), and so they were upset I wasn't completely matching him.

Apparently I was only stealing kills and not letting my teammates get gold, and I was playing wrong and so apparently despite my kda and objective control, I was more of a hindrance. 

So they asked me to afk, as soon as I made sure each of them asked, I obliged, which made them all happy for a while, until the Pyke realized I was somewhat necessary, after which he called me a child, a trash jungler but we need a smite, and so I asked for an apology, after which they called me a useless piece of sh*t, and they told me to disconnect, so I started dancing in fountain.

10-3 up and they got salty? I would have just muted all (usually do at the start of game anyways) and keep pings on, unless they are ping spamming you. Then just go farming the jungle until a big objective comes up.
Must have been gold elo, they all want to be heroes and don't understand how to be carried.

Assuming you don't have a strong history of being AFK and disconnecting from games you shouldn't see anything come of it, and even if you do the most you should receive is a low priority queue (likely a 5-minute, without any prior punishments).

So far as obliging others requesting you AFK, I'd say it's really up to you so long as all 4 players request it. I don't condone the behaviour, but realistically I think it's a bit ridiculous to expect every player to legitimately try to win a game when they're being abused and told they should AFK by all 4 of their team mates.

I don't afk in the sense of leaving the game, i just split push (even if i'm not on a champ that should split) until the game ends, either i win while my team ints while i'm free taking objectives, or i lose, because my team ints and i don't care enough about toxic people to bother helping them

Can't get banned if you do nothing wrong

Personally if they say afk, i think you should but not from the game, rather just from the team, just farm jg or split push side lanes (just make sure you're warding enough so you don't also int) or Frag where you can (out of position adc etc.)
